trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Worry weighs on Epiphron's mind.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_TODO_00<tab>/poke the hardworking observer.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Epiphron.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_001<tab>I hope she's all right... Oh, I want to go after her, but what if she comes back while I'm away?
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_002<tab>Hm? You must be a familiar. Can you help me deliver a message?
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_003<tab>I have an associate who works much too hard. I want to tell her to take a break and join me for a nice, relaxing meal.

TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_004<tab>I sent another familiar already, but it's failed to return... As an experimental entity, it is too simple to handle more than one order at a time, so it might be stuck attempting to fulfill my request.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_005<tab>Would you mind checking on them both for me? I can give you a little something if you're willing help out...?

TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_006<tab>Wonderful. Knowing my associate, she's probably dozing off somewhere around the trees to the north. This wouldn't happen if she'd get a good night's rest for once...
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_007<tab>You might need to give her a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to wake her up.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_008<tab>If my associate is nodding off, try giving her a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to wake her up.

TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_SYSTEM_009<tab>The observer is fast asleep, completely unresponsive to the familiar fussing over her. A good <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> might wake her up.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_ELDER04307_010<tab>Hmmhuh? <yawn> ...How long was I asleep?
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_ELDER04307_011<tab>Epiphron sent you? Just to invite me to eat? Why send a familiar for something so trivial?
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_ELDER04307_012<tab>Although, come to think of it, I <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> use a meal. Please let him know I'll be along soon.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_ELDER04307_013<tab>...Wait, are you a familiar as well? I thought you were one of us for a moment! Anyway, thank you for waking me.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_ELDER04307_014<tab>I suppose we'll be eating at our usual place. A nice cup of tea to start with sounds lovely... Well? Do you not also need to report to Epiphron?
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_015<tab>Thank you for your help. My familiar says my associate has accepted my invitation. That is what happened, yes?
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_016<tab>Good. That means it can carry out its duties on a basic level, at least.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_017<tab>I designed it to convey ideas through information-laden aether rather than words, so I'm happy to see the communication was successful.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_018<tab>It does seem, however, that this method is ineffective when the recipient of the message is asleep... I'll get to work on fixing that.
TEXT_AKTKZH012_04307_EPIPHRON_019<tab>But not now. Enjoying some time with my associate is the priority at the moment. Thank you again for your help.
